task.title: Savory Vegan Breakfast Recipes
task.shortdesc: If you love a delicious savory dish for breakfast, look no further than these two recipes!

taskbody.context: Below are the names, descriptions, and a photo for each recipe.

step.info: This super easy vegan breakfast sandwich can be whipped up in just 15 minutes! Perfect for when you're in a hurry and super flavorful. Vegan Breakfast Sandwich

step.cmd: Toast with Refried Beans and Avocado
step.info: Tasty, filling, but not overly heavy. This quick vegan dish is ideal for those who want something other than bacon & eggs. Refried Bean & Avocado Toast
